entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
